properties.areaDesc: Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity/Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity/Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Eastern Las Animas County; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 9 at 10:50PM MST until February 11 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches
across the mountains, and 3 to 6 inches across the lower
elevations. Locally higher amounts will be possible over and
near the mountains.

* WHERE...The northern Sangre De Cristo Mountains below 11000
feet, the southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains, the Wet Mountains
and Wet Mountain Valley, and the southern I-25 corridor
including Huerfano and Las Animas Counties.

* WHEN...From 2 PM Monday to 5 PM MST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Expect deteriorating travel conditions Monday evening
and which will continue through Tuesday. Travel could become
very difficult at times. The hazardous conditions could impact
the Monday evening and Tuesday morning commutes.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM MONDAY TO 5 PM MST TUESDAY
